posts.post_content: Effectively makes Master Transmuter nigh-immune to permanent removal against any deck not running white. The ability can't even be responded to by blowing up the Jar with a Shatter or similar spell, since sacrificing the thing is a cost, and activation costs can't be responded to.
posts.html:
Effectively makes Master Transmuter nigh-immune to permanent removal against any deck not running white. The ability can't even be responded to by blowing up the Jar with a Shatter or similar spell, since sacrificing the thing is a cost, and activation costs can't be responded to.
